alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 1:03PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. * WHERE...Willacy Island and Cameron Island Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 3 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
